title: FS  1930's Lou Gehrig Post Card Photo
author: Donscards

posts.post_title: FS  1930's Lou Gehrig Post Card Photo
posts.post_content: Selling---SGC 20  1930's Lou Gehrig Real Photo Post Card--$4800--Quite Scarce--Low Grade is due to the back where it looks like residue --check scans--Paypal or check---thanks,  Don

Just FYI, this card has all the standard features of the Worch Cigar issue, especially the distinctive font and style of the player - except the PC back.  Not sure exactly what to make of it.

Tim

[quote name="timn1" post=1836709]Just FYI, this card has all the standard features of the Worch Cigar issue, especially the distinctive font and style of the player - except the PC back.  Not sure exactly what to make of it.

Tim[/QUOTE]

Tim.  Yes, I know, the difference is the post card back.  I was told it was maybe the only one, so far, no one else had seen another
I have an Al Simmons with Worch front and PC back
I used to own a postcard back Worch Cigars Gehrig that I purchased from Leon.  It was very similar to yours, but I believe the back had more severe damage.
